accommodation.name: Khaosan Tokyo Kabuki
accommodation.description: Modern capsule hostel in Asakusa with traditional Japanese design elements
accommodation.tips: Book a traditional tatami room for authentic Japanese experience

accommodation.name: The Millennials Shibuya
accommodation.description: High-tech capsule hotel with smart pods in the heart of Shibuya
accommodation.tips: The smart pods have adjustable beds and tablet controls - very futuristic!

activities.name: Narita Airport Express
activities.description: Take the affordable Airport Express train to Tokyo Station

location.address: Narita International Airport, Narita, Chiba 282-0004, Japan

activities.tips: Buy a 7-day JR Pass for unlimited train travel - excellent value

activities.name: Tsukiji Outer Market
activities.description: Explore the famous fish market area and try fresh sushi breakfast

location.address: 4 Chome Tsukiji, Chuo City, Tokyo 104-0045, Japan

activities.tips: Try tamago sandwich and tuna sashimi from street vendors; go early for best selection

activities.name: Sensoji Temple
activities.description: Tokyo's oldest temple with traditional shopping street Nakamise-dori
activities.tips: Buy traditional snacks on Nakamise-dori street; take photos at the giant red lantern

activities.name: Ramen at Ichiran
activities.description: Famous tonkotsu ramen chain with individual booth seating
activities.tips: Customize your ramen with the order form; try adding extra chashu pork

activities.name: Shibuya Crossing
activities.description: Experience the world's busiest pedestrian crossing

location.address: Shibuya Crossing, Shibuya City, Tokyo, Japan

activities.tips: Best viewed from Starbucks or Sky observation deck for overhead view

activities.name: Convenience Store Breakfast
activities.description: Try authentic Japanese breakfast items from 7-Eleven or Family Mart
activities.tips: Try onigiri (rice balls), karaage chicken, and Japanese coffee

activities.name: Meiji Shrine
activities.description: Peaceful Shinto shrine surrounded by forest in busy Harajuku
activities.tips: Write wishes on wooden ema plaques; visit early to avoid crowds

activities.name: Harajuku Takeshita Street
activities.description: Vibrant shopping street famous for youth culture and unique fashion

location.address: Takeshita Street, Jingumae, Shibuya City, Tokyo, Japan

activities.tips: Try rainbow cotton candy and crepes; perfect for quirky souvenir shopping

activities.name: Ueno Park & Museums
activities.description: Large park with multiple museums, zoo, and temples
activities.tips: Visit Tokyo National Museum for affordable cultural experience; beautiful during cherry blossom season

activities.name: Yakitori Alley (Omoide Yokocho)
activities.description: Narrow alley filled with tiny yakitori stalls and bars

location.address: 1 Chome-2 Nishishinjuku, Shinjuku City, Tokyo 160-0023, Japan

activities.tips: Try chicken skewers and cold beer; very authentic local experience

activities.name: Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building
activities.description: Free observation decks with panoramic views of Tokyo and Mount Fuji
activities.tips: Go on clear days for Mount Fuji views; both north and south towers have different perspectives

activities.name: Akihabara Electric Town
activities.description: Electronics and anime/manga paradise with multi-story shops
activities.tips: Visit Yodobashi Camera for electronics; Don Quijote for quirky Japanese goods

activities.name: Sushi at Sushi Zanmai
activities.description: Affordable but high-quality sushi chain popular with locals
activities.tips: Try the tuna sampler and ask for recommendations from the chef

activities.name: Tokyo Skytree (observation deck)
activities.description: World's second tallest structure with spectacular city views

location.address: 1 Chome-1-2 Oshiage, Sumida City, Tokyo 131-0045, Japan

activities.tips: Buy tickets online for discount; sunset time offers beautiful city lights

activities.name: Izakaya Torikizoku
activities.description: Budget-friendly izakaya chain with ¬•298 menu items
activities.tips: Everything on menu is same price; try karaage chicken and highball cocktails

activities.name: Tsukiji Outer Market Food Tour
activities.description: Self-guided food tour trying various street foods and local specialties

location.address: 4 Chome Tsukiji, Chuo City, Tokyo 104-0045, Japan

activities.tips: Try tamagoyaki, wagyu beef skewers, and fresh tuna sashimi from different stalls

activities.name: Imperial Palace East Gardens
activities.description: Beautiful traditional Japanese gardens, free to visit
activities.tips: Closed on Mondays and Fridays; beautiful seasonal flowers and peaceful atmosphere

activities.name: TeamLab Borderless
activities.description: Digital art museum with interactive installations
activities.tips: Book tickets well in advance; wear comfortable shoes and avoid white clothing

activities.name: Airport Express to Narita
activities.description: Return journey to airport via express train

location.address: Tokyo Station to Narita International Airport

activities.tips: Allow extra time for last-minute souvenir shopping at the airport

tips: Get a 7-day JR Pass for unlimited train travel - excellent value for money
Download Google Translate app with camera function for reading menus
Carry cash as many places don't accept cards, especially smaller establishments
Bow when greeting people and remove shoes when entering temples or traditional buildings
Download offline maps as WiFi may not always be available
Try convenience store food - it's surprisingly fresh and delicious
